welcometitle: Hello! Welcome to my personal site!
textaboutme: Hi! My name is Thomas Kwashnak! I'm just a geeky and nerdy person who's into coding and math! Want to learn more about me? Checkout the About Me page here!
textprojects: Want to see what I'm doing? Check out my projects! Here you will find a (hopefully) complete list of my current projects, and an archive of projects I've previously done
